src:
Data dan Fakta Premier League: Arsenal vs Wolverhampton
01 Nov 2019, 15:32 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Peringkat 5 Arsenal akan menjamu peringkat 12 Wolverhampton pada pekan ke-11 Premier League 2019/20, Sabtu (02/11/2019). Berikut beberapa data dan fakta yang melatarbelakangi pertandingan di Emirates Stadium ini.
Dalam laga kandangnya melawan Wolverhampton di Premier League musim lalu, Arsenal meraih hasil imbang 1-1. Tertinggal oleh gol Ivan Cavaleiro menit 13, Arsenal terhindar dari kekalahan berkat equaliser Henrikh Mkhitaryan menit 86.
Musim lalu, ketika bertandang ke markas Wolverhampton, Arsenal menyerah 1-3 oleh gol-gol Ruben Neves, Matt Doherty, dan Diogo Jota. Itu adalah satu-satunya kekalahan Arsenal dalam 10 pertemuan dengan Wolverhampton di Premier League (M7 S2 K1).
Arsenal selalu imbang dengan skor identik 1-1 dalam 2 laga kandang terakhirnya melawan Wolverhampton di Premier League.
Arsenal tak terkalahkan dalam 7 laga kandang terakhirnya melawan Wolverhampton di semua kompetisi (M5 S2 K0).
Selalu tercipta maksimal 2 gol dalam 5 laga kandang terakhir Arsenal melawan Wolverhampton di semua kompetisi.
Scroll terus ke bawah untuk statistik yang lebih lengkap.
text:
Premier League Data and Facts: Arsenal vs Wolverhampton
Nov 1 2019, 15:32 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Rank 5 Arsenal will host 12th Wolverhampton in the 11th week of the 2019/20 Premier League, Saturday (02/11/2019). Here are some data and facts behind the match at the Emirates Stadium.
In his home game against Wolverhampton in the Premier League last season, Arsenal won a 1-1 draw. Left behind by Ivan Cavaleiro's 13th minute goal, Arsenal avoided defeat thanks to an equalizer Henrikh Mkhitaryan 86 minutes.
Last season, when they traveled to Wolverhampton headquarters, Arsenal surrendered 1-3 by goals from Ruben Neves, Matt Doherty and Diogo Jota. It was Arsenal's only defeat in 10 meetings with Wolverhampton in the Premier League (M7 S2 K1).
Arsenal always draw with an identical score of 1-1 in their last 2 home matches against Wolverhampton in the Premier League.
Arsenal are unbeaten in their last 7 home matches against Wolverhampton in all competitions (M5 S2 K0).
A maximum of 2 goals have always been created in Arsenal's last 5 home matches against Wolverhampton in all competitions.
Scroll down for more complete statistics.
